data.name: The University of Sheffield
content: Currently enrolled in advanced studies focusing on Machine Learning and Adaptive Intelligence, Text Processing, and Natural Language Processing.

Refactored a legacy codebase as part of a Software Re-engineering module, reducing code complexity, enhancing performance, and increasing unit test coverage to improve system reliability and maintainability.
Actively working towards achieving a 2:1 grade while engaging in industry-driven projects and academic research.

data.name: Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology
content: Completed a comprehensive curriculum of nearly 54 modules, focusing on foundational areas such as Data Structures & Algorithms, Operating Systems, Database Management Systems (DBMS), and Computer Architecture.
Participated and won numerous prizes in various national and international hackathons.
